articles.description: Chadwick Boseman's final  movie Ma Rainey's Black Bottom bowed on Netflix Friday. The Black Panther lead died this August at the age of 43 after secretly struggling against colon cancer for four years.
articles.content:

articles.title: Taylor Swift's Evermore album debuts at UK Number 1 and sets chart record - Official Charts Company
articles.description: Taylor Swift's surprise-released ninth album becomes her sixth chart-topper in just eight years.
articles.content:
Taylor Swifts surprise new album Evermore debuts at Number 1 on this weeks Official Albums Chart.
